_comment: DO NOT EDIT: FILE GENERATED AUTOMATICALLY BY PTERODACTYL PANEL - PTERODACTYL.IO
name: Deemix
author: info@finniedj.nl
description:
Deemix egg

Deemix is software to download musing from Deezer

Note: Deemix does not update automatically, you have to reinstall to update!

https://deemix.app/

installation.script:
apt update
apt install unzip curl wget -y
cd /mnt/server
curl -L -o deemix.zip http://gitlab.com/Bockiii/deemix-src/-/jobs/artifacts/master/download?job=dl_src && \
unzip deemix
mv /mnt/server/deemix-gui/* /mnt/server
rm -r deemix-gui
wget https://raw.githubusercontent.com/finnie2006/ptero-eggs/Deemix/start.sh
chmod +x /mnt/server/start.sh
rm -r /mnt/server/deemix.zip
